text: Subiaco Oval, also known as Patersons Stadium and Domain Stadium, was a sports stadium. It was the largest sports stadium in Perth, Western Australia. It was in the suburb of Subiaco, about three kilometres west of Perth's city centre. The stadium was demolished in November 2019. ==References== ==Further reading== * Wilson, Ray (2008) Field of Dreams: Celebration of Subiaco Oval's 100th year Perth, Western Australia: The West Australian 16 pp â€“ inserted into 7 May 2008 edition of The West Australian newspaper. ==Other websites== * Satellite image of Subiaco Oval Category:Soccer stadiums in Australia Category:Australian rules football Category:Sports buildings in Australia Category:Buildings and structures in Perth, Western Australia Category:1908 establishments in Australia Category:2019 disestablishments
title: Subiaco Oval
